en_us: Adds the shamir 'Vigere' to Metallurgy. It heals you when you block with a shield.
Vigere alters shields to heal the user upon blocking an attack.

The Vigere Shamir is found on Barimium Bands. It can be placed onto shields.

Blocking an attack will heal the user 1.5 hearts and apply Mining Fatigue VI for 3 seconds.
Healing damages the shield more.
